I don't think this makes a difference; if you look at the test, it passes now, so it's doing the right thing.

 Thanks very much for the fix!

 However, I think there might be a small bug in line 129 of your change to
 tensorflow/python/keras/layers/embeddings.py:

 should it not be:

 with ops.device('/cpu:0'):

 instead of:

 with ops.device('cpu:0'):

 —

body:
I don't think this makes a difference; if you look at the test, it passes
now, so it's doing the right thing.

> Thanks very much for the fix!
>
> However, I think there might be a small bug in line 129 of your change to
> tensorflow/python/keras/layers/embeddings.py:
>
> should it not be:
>
> with ops.device('/cpu:0'):
>
> instead of:
>
> with ops.device('cpu:0'):
